mapper.sql: id, patientCode, XL, BXB, ZXLXBBFB, LBXBBFB, DHXBBFB, ZXLXBS, LBXBS, DHXBS, HXBS, XHDB, HXBJY, PJHXBTJ, PJXHDBL, HXBFBKD, XXB, XXBPJTJ, XXBJY, XXBFBKD, NCGBZ, NBXBS, NHXBS, QBDB, GBZAM, ZDB, BDB, BQDBBZ, YGAXZTM, JXLSM, ZDHS, ZJDHS, ZDZS, SS, JG, ZCO2, NS, PTT, ZDGC, GYSZ, GMDZDBD, DMDZDBD, ZDBa, JSJM, JSJMTGM, RSTQM, KPlus, NaPlus, ClNe, Ca2Plus, NXMYSJ, NXMYHDD, GJBZHBZ, XWDBY, HHBFNXHMSJ, D2JT, CJZXJS, XQYLT3, XQYLT4, JGDBDL, BNP, NTproBNP, hsCRP, CRP
mapper.update:
UPDATE df_specimen_checking_analysis
patientCode = #{map.patientCode},
XL = #{map.xL},
BXB = #{map.bXB},
ZXLXBBFB = #{map.zXLXBBFB},
LBXBBFB = #{map.lBXBBFB},
DHXBBFB = #{map.dHXBBFB},
ZXLXBS = #{map.zXLXBS},
LBXBS = #{map.lBXBS},
DHXBS = #{map.dHXBS},
HXBS = #{map.hXBS},
XHDB = #{map.xHDB},
HXBJY = #{map.hXBJY},
PJHXBTJ = #{map.pJHXBTJ},
PJXHDBL = #{map.pJXHDBL},
HXBFBKD = #{map.hXBFBKD},
XXB = #{map.xXB},
XXBPJTJ = #{map.xXBPJTJ},
XXBJY = #{map.xXBJY},
XXBFBKD = #{map.xXBFBKD},
NCGBZ = #{map.nCGBZ},
NBXBS = #{map.nBXBS},
NHXBS = #{map.nHXBS},
QBDB = #{map.qBDB},
GBZAM = #{map.gBZAM},
ZDB = #{map.zDB},
BDB = #{map.bDB},
BQDBBZ = #{map.bQDBBZ},
YGAXZTM = #{map.yGAXZTM},
JXLSM = #{map.jXLSM},
ZDHS = #{map.zDHS},
ZJDHS = #{map.zJDHS},
ZDZS = #{map.zDZS},
SS = #{map.sS},
JG = #{map.jG},
ZCO2 = #{map.zCO2},
NS = #{map.nS},
PTT = #{map.pTT},
ZDGC = #{map.zDGC},
GYSZ = #{map.gYSZ},
GMDZDBD = #{map.gMDZDBD},
DMDZDBD = #{map.dMDZDBD},
ZDBa = #{map.zDBa},
JSJM = #{map.jSJM},
JSJMTGM = #{map.jSJMTGM},
RSTQM = #{map.rSTQM},
KPlus = #{map.kPlus},
NaPlus = #{map.naPlus},
ClNe = #{map.clNe},
Ca2Plus = #{map.ca2Plus},
NXMYSJ = #{map.nXMYSJ},
NXMYHDD = #{map.nXMYHDD},
GJBZHBZ = #{map.gJBZHBZ},
XWDBY = #{map.xWDBY},

XQYLT3 = #{map.xQYLT3},
XQYLT4 = #{map.xQYLT4},
JGDBDL = #{map.jGDBDL},
BNP = #{map.bNP},
NTproBNP = #{map.nTproBNP},
hsCRP = #{map.hsCRP},
CRP = #{map.cRP},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM df_specimen_checking_analysis
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND patientCode like CONCAT('%', #{patientCode} , '%')
AND XL like CONCAT('%', #{xL} , '%')
AND BXB like CONCAT('%', #{bXB} , '%')
AND ZXLXBBFB like CONCAT('%', #{zXLXBBFB} , '%')
AND LBXBBFB like CONCAT('%', #{lBXBBFB} , '%')
AND DHXBBFB like CONCAT('%', #{dHXBBFB} , '%')
AND ZXLXBS like CONCAT('%', #{zXLXBS} , '%')
AND LBXBS like CONCAT('%', #{lBXBS} , '%')
AND DHXBS like CONCAT('%', #{dHXBS} , '%')
AND HXBS like CONCAT('%', #{hXBS} , '%')
AND XHDB like CONCAT('%', #{xHDB} , '%')
AND HXBJY like CONCAT('%', #{hXBJY} , '%')
AND PJHXBTJ like CONCAT('%', #{pJHXBTJ} , '%')
AND PJXHDBL like CONCAT('%', #{pJXHDBL} , '%')
AND HXBFBKD like CONCAT('%', #{hXBFBKD} , '%')
AND XXB like CONCAT('%', #{xXB} , '%')
AND XXBPJTJ like CONCAT('%', #{xXBPJTJ} , '%')
AND XXBJY like CONCAT('%', #{xXBJY} , '%')
AND XXBFBKD like CONCAT('%', #{xXBFBKD} , '%')
AND NCGBZ like CONCAT('%', #{nCGBZ} , '%')
AND NBXBS like CONCAT('%', #{nBXBS} , '%')
AND NHXBS like CONCAT('%', #{nHXBS} , '%')
AND QBDB like CONCAT('%', #{qBDB} , '%')
AND GBZAM like CONCAT('%', #{gBZAM} , '%')
AND ZDB like CONCAT('%', #{zDB} , '%')
AND BDB like CONCAT('%', #{bDB} , '%')
AND BQDBBZ like CONCAT('%', #{bQDBBZ} , '%')
AND YGAXZTM like CONCAT('%', #{yGAXZTM} , '%')
AND JXLSM like CONCAT('%', #{jXLSM} , '%')
AND ZDHS like CONCAT('%', #{zDHS} , '%')
AND ZJDHS like CONCAT('%', #{zJDHS} , '%')
AND ZDZS like CONCAT('%', #{zDZS} , '%')
AND SS like CONCAT('%', #{sS} , '%')
AND JG like CONCAT('%', #{jG} , '%')
AND ZCO2 like CONCAT('%', #{zCO2} , '%')
AND NS like CONCAT('%', #{nS} , '%')
AND PTT like CONCAT('%', #{pTT} , '%')
AND ZDGC like CONCAT('%', #{zDGC} , '%')
AND GYSZ like CONCAT('%', #{gYSZ} , '%')
AND GMDZDBD like CONCAT('%', #{gMDZDBD} , '%')
AND DMDZDBD like CONCAT('%', #{dMDZDBD} , '%')
AND ZDBa like CONCAT('%', #{zDBa} , '%')
AND JSJM like CONCAT('%', #{jSJM} , '%')
AND JSJMTGM like CONCAT('%', #{jSJMTGM} , '%')
AND RSTQM like CONCAT('%', #{rSTQM} , '%')
AND KPlus like CONCAT('%', #{kPlus} , '%')
AND NaPlus like CONCAT('%', #{naPlus} , '%')
AND ClNe like CONCAT('%', #{clNe} , '%')
AND Ca2Plus like CONCAT('%', #{ca2Plus} , '%')
AND NXMYSJ like CONCAT('%', #{nXMYSJ} , '%')
AND NXMYHDD like CONCAT('%', #{nXMYHDD} , '%')
AND GJBZHBZ like CONCAT('%', #{gJBZHBZ} , '%')
AND XWDBY like CONCAT('%', #{xWDBY} , '%')
AND HHBFNXHMSJ like CONCAT('%', #{hHBFNXHMSJ} , '%')
AND D2JT like CONCAT('%', #{d2JT} , '%')
AND CJZXJS like CONCAT('%', #{cJZXJS} , '%')
AND XQYLT3 like CONCAT('%', #{xQYLT3} , '%')
AND XQYLT4 like CONCAT('%', #{xQYLT4} , '%')
AND JGDBDL like CONCAT('%', #{jGDBDL} , '%')
AND BNP like CONCAT('%', #{bNP} , '%')
AND NTproBNP like CONCAT('%', #{nTproBNP} , '%')
AND hsCRP like CONCAT('%', #{hsCRP} , '%')
AND CRP like CONCAT('%', #{cRP} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
